channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8232] CBO Trunk Merge: Address Review Comments
item.summary: CBO Trunk Merge: Address Review Comments

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
This addresses the Review comments in RB except for Refactoring SemanticAnalyzer.
Filed HIVE-8234 to keep track SemanticAnalyzer refactoring.

Overall: -1 no tests executed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12670771/HIVE-8232.patch
